welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yakima, where the natural beauty of the Yakima Valley meets the vibrant culture of the city. Get ready to explore our renowned wineries, outdoor recreation, and friendly community â€“ we can't wait for you to experience it all!

restaurants.name: Taj Palace
restaurants.description: Taj Palace is a indian restaurant located in Yakima.
restaurants.address: 2710 W Nob Hill Blvd (S. 28'th Ave.), Yakima, WA 98902

restaurants.description: Ozeki Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Yakima.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yakima Air Terminal Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Yakima Air Terminal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'YKM Airport WiFi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bowers Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
